metadata.synopsis: Viconia lines when applying heart form curses on players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Run through the mapping of the heart in the House of Grief on a party without Shadowheart2. Fight Viconia

0.speaker: Viconia DeVir
0.text: You bear a prying heart - how shameless. Let me slake your thirst for secrets.
0.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt

1.speaker: Viconia DeVir
1.text: A heartform of shadow. I know you too well, girl. I know exactly what hurts you most.
1.context: NodeContext: battle taunt, referring back to the player's personality type (or heartform) as discovered earlier - in this case specific to Shadowhear. A corresponding  magic curse will accompany each taunt
